title: Ticket #2521: Submitter ClassAd not documented
description: In understanding the 7.6.4 version history item associated with #2445, I realize that ClassAds of type Submitter are completely undocumented.
remarks:
2011-Oct-04 16:08:53 by smoler:
I'll take care of adding the right empty sections and headers and such, but the person who is assigned this ticket will need to populate the empty section with attributes (and definitions) that appear in Submitter ClassAds.

2011-Dec-01 11:37:55 by smoler:
Pete's gone. Reassigning ticket to Todd, who will have to figure out who will work on it.

2012-Jan-24 11:53:43 by smoler:
Reassigning to TJ, who will work with Karen to get the attributes documented.

2012-Feb-24 10:41:39 by johnkn:
  • MyType = "Submitter" Indicates that this is a submitter ad
  • Name = "name@submit.domain" Fully qualified name of the user or group
  • ScheddName = "submit.domain" Fully qualified name of the machine that the submitter submitted from.
  • ScheddIpAddr = "<ip?attrs>"
  • SubmitterTag = "" | "cm.domain" name of the central manager that this submitter originated from. If the value is "", then the submitter is from the home pool.
  • RunningJobs = 0 Number of jobs from this submitter that are running now.
  • IdleJobs = 0 Number of jobs from this submitter that are now idle
  • HeldJobs = 0 Number of jobs from this submitter that are held
  • FlockedJobs = 0 Number of jobs from this submitter that are running in another pool
